Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media are talking about the Australian Government's allocation of funds towards the AUKUS subs project despite pressing issues such as welfare and the upcoming budget. An article written by a member of the Economic Inclusion Cttee Ben Phillips is circulating Twitter promoting the government's opportunity to aid disadvantaged people in the country. While opinions differ online these posts highlight the concerns of everyday Australians who are voicing their beliefs on current political issues.
